text: An animated cartoon is a hand-worked movie for the cinema, television or computer screen. It tells some kind of story, even if it is a very short one. Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (1937) is first ever American animated feature film. After that, it came more long animated cartoons, including Pinocchio (1940), Fantasia (1940), Dumbo (1941), Bambi (1942), Cinderella (1950), Charlotte's Web (1973), The Secret of NIMH (1982), An American Tail (1986), and The Little Mermaid (1989). Category:Animation
title: Animated cartoon
